code: @Override public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     try {         if (dbConnection.isClosed()) {             dbConnection = endpoint.initJdbc().         }     } catch (Exception e) {         throw new InvalidStateException("Database connection closed and could not be re-opened.", e).     }     String payload = exchange.getIn().getBody(String.class).     if (dbConnection.isServerMinimumVersion(9, 0)) {         try (CallableStatement statement = dbConnection.prepareCall("{call pg_notify(?, ?)}")) {             statement.setString(1, endpoint.getChannel()).             statement.setString(2, payload).             statement.execute().         }     } else {         String sql = String.format("NOTIFY %s, '%s'", endpoint.getChannel(), payload).         try (PreparedStatement statement = dbConnection.prepareStatement(sql)) {             statement.execute().         }     } }
@Override protected void doStart() throws Exception {     super.doStart().     dbConnection = endpoint.initJdbc(). }
@Override protected void doStop() throws Exception {     super.doStop().     if (dbConnection != null) {         dbConnection.close().     } }
